Bank PHB, nke a maara dị ka Platinum Habib Bank, bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na Naijiria

Ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ nke ise kachasị na-enye ọrụ ego na Naịjirịa.
Ihe onwunwe ụlọ akụ ahụ ruru ihe karịrị ijeri dọla isii.
Francis Atuche- CEO / MD nke Bank PHB
Bank PHB bụ onye otu Bank PHB Group, nke nwere ịsị ụlọọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria, yana ndị enyemaka na Gambia, Liberia, Nigeria, Sierra Leone na Uganda.
E guzobere Bank PHB n'afọ 2005 site na njikọta dị n'etiti Platinum Bank Plc na Habib Nigeria Bank Plc
Kemgbe e bidoro ya, ụlọ akụ ahụ gbasoro atụmatụ mgbasawanye site n'inweta na ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka n'ime na na-enweghị obodo ya nke Naịjirịa

N'abalị ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, Central Bank nke Naịjirịa wepụrụ ikikere ọrụ nke BankPHB tinyere nke Afribank na Spring Bank n'ihi na ha egosighi ikike iji mee ndozighari tupu oge njedebe nke September 30, 2011.
E kere Keystone Bank Limited na August 5, 2011, site n'iwere ihe onwunwe niile (gụnyere ndị enyemaka) na ụgwọ nke BankPHB ugbu a, nke a kagburu ikike ụlọ akụ azụmahịa ya n'otu ụbọchị ahụ.
